title: ﻿ Circular Loop / ﻿HaengUnSiWoo Architects
description: The eco-experience center built within the Gangjeong Cruise Terminal was designed with a focus on utilizing the existing waterside park to plan an experience center and observation deck. To overcome the over 10-meter slope, the experience center was strategically placed between the parking lot and the circular plaza, creating a "circular loop" that ensures seamless accessibility for everyone.
author: Miwa Negoro

title: MARLIM Costa Cabral Residential Building / Atelier d'Arquitectura Lopes da Costa
description: The Marlim Costa Cabral refurbishment project is located in the city of Porto and aimed to convert the existing four-storey building into seven flats of different types.

title: A One Bedroom House That Feels Like Home Sweet Home
description: Condon Scott Architects has shared photos of a small one-bedroom home they designed that measures in at just 323 square feet (30sqm).
